code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const sendCommand=async command=>{try{const res=await fetch(`http://localhost:8000/ros2/${command}`);const data=await res.json();setResponse(data.output||data.error);}catch(error){setResponse('Error connecting to backend');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"ROS 2 Command Interface"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>sendCommand('start'),children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>sendCommand('stop'),children:"Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>sendCommand('turtlebot'),children:"Turtle Bot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Response: ",response]})]});}export default App;
